name: Karakura
description: The Karakura is a Medium-sized fiend known for its exceptional charm and manipulative abilities, characterized by its high charisma and deceptive appearance.
memorable: The Karakura can shift between forms and ensnare foes in darkness, making it a cunning and slippery adversary.
goals: To charm and manipulate foes, often using deception to further its own ends.
relations: Typically acts independently but may ally with other fiends or sinister creatures.
environment: Often found in dark areas or underground, primarily active at night.
strengths: Possesses high Charisma, flight capability, and strong illusion abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, making it susceptible to certain classes and spells.
attacks: Utilizes claw attacks and abilities like Charm to control enemies, as well as Shroud in Darkness to transport foes to the Plane of Shadow.
most_powerful_ability: Shroud in Darkness, which can trap enemies in the Plane of Shadow and induce short-term madness.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 14, enabling it to perceive hidden threats in darkness.
skills: Excels in deception, persuasion, stealth, showcasing its expertise in manipulation and scouting efforts.
additional_information: Shapechanging ability allows it to become a Small or Medium humanoid.
Night Walkers ability restricts its presence on the Material Plane to nighttime or underground.
Telepathic Bond enables communication with charmed targets across any distance.
Immunity to poison and completely resistant to the poisoned condition.
Can only maintain one charmed target at a time.
test_queries: fiend that manipulates shadows and darkness
creature that can change shape and charm foes
